ctx: intros l t1 t2 t3 Hcov HIn Hinb.
exceptions.tactic: intros l1 l2 t'1 t'2 t'3 Hperm Hcov' IH.

chat.content:
A: Type
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
empty: A
============================
forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t3 t2 -> inb t3 t1

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive cover : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover _%list_scope Arguments cover_node (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
inb : forall A : Type, btree A -> btree A -> Prop
inb_trans : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> inb t2 t3 -> inb t1 t3
cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3
cover_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_sind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp, (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
inb_antisym : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> inb t2 t1 -> t1 = t2
number_of_nodes_inb_le : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> number_of_nodes t1 <= number_of_nodes t2
cover_cons_l : forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover (t2 :: l1) (node t2 t1)
innodeR : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
inb_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
inb_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
innodeL : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
distinct_leaves_r : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), distinct_leaves (node t1 t2) -> distinct_leaves t2
distinct_leaves_l : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), distinct_leaves (node t1 t2) -> distinct_leaves t1
cover_not_nil : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l t -> l <> nil
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, In a ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} empty : A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} empty : A |- Type] ?f : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} empty : A |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} empty : A |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} empty : A |- list ?A]
one_cover_ex : forall l : list (btree A), l <> nil -> exists t : btree A, cover l t
inb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a p : btree A, {inb a p} + {~ inb a p}
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0
in_frequency_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a l -> In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l))
in_frequency_map_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l)) -> In a l
cover_permutation : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t
number_of_occurrences : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> nat
encode : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> code A -> list A -> list bool
weight : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> nat
find_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> code A -> list bool
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
in_alphabet_compute_code : forall (A : Type) (m : list A) (t : btree A), (forall a : A, In a m -> inb (leaf a) t) -> in_alphabet m (compute_code t)
find_code_correct2 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_key c -> In (a, l) c -> find_code eqA_dec a c = l
code_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (c : code A) (a : A), {exists l : list bool, In (a, l) c} + {forall l : list bool, ~ In (a, l) c}

```  
intros l t1 t2 t3 Hcov HIn Hinb.
apply cover_ind with (l := l) (b := t1).
- assumption.
- intros l1 l2 t'1 t'2 t'3 Hperm Hcov' IH.
  apply cover_ind with (l := node t'1 t'2 :: l2) (b := t3).
  + assumption.
  + apply cover_node with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2) (t1 := t'1) (t2 := t'2) (t3 := t'3).
    * apply Hperm.
    * assumption.
  + apply IH. apply cover_permutation with (t := t1) (l1 := l1) (l2 := t'1 :: t'2 :: l2).
    * apply Hperm.
    * apply cover_node with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2) (t1 := t'1) (t2 := t'2) (t3 := t'3).
      ** apply Hperm.
      ** assumption.
- assumption.
```

original: intros l t1 t2 t3 Hcov HIn Hinb. apply cover_ind with (l := l) (b := t1). - auto. - intros l1 l2 t'1 t'2 t'3 Hperm Hcov' IH. apply cover_ind with (l := node t'1 t'2 :: l2) (b := t3). + auto. + apply cover_node with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2) (t1 := t'1) (t2 := t'2) (t3 := t'3). * apply Hperm. * auto. + apply IH. apply cover_permutation with (t := t1) (l1 := l1) (l2 := t'1 :: t'2 :: l2). * apply Hperm. * apply cover_node with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2) (t1 := t'1) (t2 := t'2) (t3 := t'3). ** apply Hperm. ** auto. - auto.
